name: Toss the Toast
description:
A star is born !

Choose your toast and try to land it in the customer's plate.

But beware, the Hygiene Service Department is watching.
You'll have to land it on the safe side !

Unlock and collect unique toasts and master the art of toast-tossing !

Gotta Splat'Em All !

If the Itch.io embedded zip file doesn't work, play here: https://toss-the-toast.netlify.app/
